title: Blow Them Away With Your Fallen Angel Powers
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>*Sigh*.... I don’t feel like doing anything....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>What’s wrong, Yoshiko-san? You look kind of down.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s just that time of the year.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hm? What’s with the “Eh”? Is something wrong?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I didn’t call you Yohane-san, though, is that okay....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ah, you’re right.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Don’t tell me.... the May sickness? That’s not good! It shouldn’t be a problem for you.... You can at least use your fallen angel powers to blow the melancholic feelings away!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eeeh!? Even if you say that all of a sudden....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Let’s go replenish your fallen angel powers! Come on, start getting ready now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
